content: **crochet turkey hat free pattern by crochet for you ** looking for a cute turkey hat pattern for thanksgiving i made this quick and easy turkey hat in a few hours look at the final result i have got i hope you like it do you know what is my favorite part of this hat pattern it is a chain loop pompom i made this crochet turkey hat made in toddler size follow the hat sizing guide-how to crochet hat in any size to make this hat in any size
